When Crain's Creation enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed. [i](It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)[/i]
Tap three untapped creatures you control: Target player mills three cards.
Tap ten untapped creatures you control: Target player mills twenty cards.
notes:

 - metalcraft
